name: firecrawl
title: Firecrawl
description: Powerful web scraping, crawling, and search with LLM-ready markdown output and structured data extraction.
about:
# Firecrawl MCP Server

Firecrawl is a powerful web scraping and crawling engine that turns any website into LLM-ready markdown or structured data. This MCP server allows you to use Firecrawl's capabilities directly within your AI client.

## Key Features

- **Scrape**: Convert any URL to clean markdown, optimized for LLMs.
- **Search**: Search the web and get content from results in one go.
- **Crawl**: Recursively crawl websites with smart filtering and depth control.
- **Map**: Discover all indexed URLs on a domain.
- **Extract**: Use LLMs to extract structured data (JSON) from web pages using custom schemas.
- **Agent**: Autonomous web data gathering agent that searches and navigates to find exactly what you need.

## Getting Started

To use this MCP, you'll need a Firecrawl API key. You can get one for free at [firecrawl.dev](https://firecrawl.dev).

Once you have your key, add the MCP using:

```bash
scooter_add firecrawl
```

You will be prompted to enter your `FIRECRAWL_API_KEY`.

tools.name: firecrawl_scrape
tools.title: Scrape URL
tools.description: Scrape content from a single URL with advanced options. Best for single page content extraction when the URL is known.

onlyMainContent.description: Only return the main content of the page, excluding headers, footers, and nav

maxAge.description: Maximum age of cached data in milliseconds. Set to 0 to disable cache.

waitFor.description: Time in milliseconds to wait for the page to load

tools.name: firecrawl_search
tools.title: Web Search
tools.description: Search the web and optionally extract content from search results. Supports search operators like site: and intitle:.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5)

tools.name: firecrawl_map
tools.title: Map Website
tools.description: Map a website to discover all indexed URLs. Useful for finding specific sections before scraping.

limit.description: Maximum number of URLs to return

tools.name: firecrawl_crawl
tools.title: Crawl Website
tools.description: Starts a crawl job on a website and extracts content from all pages. Best for comprehensive coverage.

url.description: The URL to start crawling from

limit.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl

allowExternalLinks.description: Whether to allow crawling external links

tools.name: firecrawl_check_crawl_status
tools.title: Check Crawl Status
tools.description: Check the status and progress of a crawl job using its ID.

tools.name: firecrawl_extract
tools.title: Extract Structured Data
tools.description: Extract structured information from web pages using LLM capabilities and a JSON schema.

urls.description: Array of URLs to extract from

schema.description: JSON schema for the extracted data

tools.name: firecrawl_agent
tools.title: Autonomous Agent
tools.description: Autonomous web data gathering agent. Describe what data you want, and it will search and navigate to find it.

prompt.description: Natural language description of the data you want

schema.description: Optional JSON schema for structured output

tools.name: firecrawl_agent_status
tools.title: Check Agent Status
tools.description: Check the status and results of an autonomous agent job.
